title: Minister Attaf receives a phone call from his Italian counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf, received today a phone call from his Italian counterpart, Mr. Antonio Tajani, who presented his congratulations on the occasion of his appointment as head of Algerian diplomacy.

Intervening the day after the telephone conversation between the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune, and his Italian counterpart, Mr. Sergio Mattarella, the discussion between the two ministers allowed to examine the progress made on the path of deepening relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries bound by a Treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation which celebrate this year the 20th anniversary.

In addition, and under the regional and international news, the two ministers discussed issues of common interest on both sides of the Mediterranean, reaffirming the convergence of their views based on respect for international legality and their shared ambition to promote stability and prosperity in particular in the Maghreb and beyond in the whole of Sub-Saharan Africa.
